thread.title: Wells Fargo urges Mayor Ted Wheeler to rethink pledge to consider dropping bank
thread.title_full: Wells Fargo urges Mayor Ted Wheeler to rethink pledge to consider dropping bank

author: Jessica Floum | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Wells Fargo urges Mayor Ted Wheeler to rethink pledge to consider dropping bank
text: Wells Fargo is urging Portland Mayor Ted Wheeler to make a "well-informed" decision after he Tweeted that he would consider taking the city's banking elsewhere in an effort to discourage the bank's role in financing the controversial Dakota Access Pipeline.
